$CYTO On the daily a possible very rare "Bullish Three Line Strike" pattern forming here. If not familiar this is a trend continuation pattern that occurs in an uptrend, after consolidation.  
- It is made up of three bullish candlesticks each with a higher close than the previous one on rising volume outside the "Trading Range"✅ 
- followed by a fourth candlestick that pulls back to the start point on low volume ✅.  
Basically a backtest to shake out traders back inside the Trading Range. Today's fourth candle is a tall "engulfing bearish candle" that retraces all the gains made by the preceding three candles. @Hookedontonics Overall price action is significantly unusual. The float is very low so easily prone to manipulation by Smart Money, by imbalancing the order book in this manner.
